MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY8 postcode area of Leven. Following a previous power cut, It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6:15pm in order to remove the faulty section of underground cable in the Upper Largo area and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:07pm on Monday, 15 March 2021
